comment:
Extracted Variables:
- x: number of trips made by the new company
- y: number of trips made by the old company

Definitions:
- x, y are decision variables representing the number of trips made by the new and old company, respectively.

- new_one: number of gifts delivered per trip by the new company (50 gifts)
- old_one: number of gifts delivered per trip by the old company (70 gifts)
- new_one_: liters of diesel used per trip by the new company (30 liters)
- old_one_: liters of diesel used per trip by the old company (40 liters)

- Z: objective function to minimize the total amount of diesel used (Z = 30x + 40y)

Constraints:
1. Total number of gifts delivered must be at least 1000: 50x + 70y \geq 1000
2. At most 15 trips made by the new company: x \leq 15
3. At least 40% of all trips must be made by the old company: y \geq 0.4(x + y)
